    Interface IAsyncRelayCommand<TParam>

    Extends System.Windows.Input.ICommand to allow asynchronous command execution, where the accepted parameter of the ExecuteAsync(TParam) and CanExecute(TParam) is strongly typed to eliminate type casting inside the registered callbacks.

    Inherited Members
    IAsyncRelayCommand.CanExecute()
